column2: to study or examine something in detail, in order to discover more about it
to attack someone violently or criticize someone strongly // to cause someone to experience a lot of unpleasant things
(verb) to give a possible explanation for something
(verb to spoil something or make it weaker so that it is les effective
(noun) a gess that you make or an opinion that you form based on the information that you have
(adv) in a way that is based on facts and not influenced by personal beliefs or feelings
(adj) making you feel that something illegal is happening or that something is wrong
(verb) to accept behaviour and beliefs that are different from your own, altough you might not agree with or approve of them
(preposition) used to say that one team or person is competing against another
